original_text: That is the work for the Tent of Meeting that the descendants of Gershon must do. Ithamar, the son of Aaron the priest, will tell them the things that they must do.’
korean_text: 게르손 자손의 종족들이 회막에서 할 일은 이러하며 그들의 직무는 제사장 아론의 아들 이다말이 감독할지니라

sentences.original_text: That is the work for the Tent of Meeting
that the descendants of Gershon must do
Ithamar, the son of Aaron the priest,
